titleStmt.title: SII 7.872: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 872. (A.R. No. 244 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭantaiyum porcayap pāvaiyuñ cirttaṉic ce
lviyun taṉ perunteviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭutuyar Ūḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟaināṭu n=tuṭarvaṉavelip
paṭar vaṉavāsiyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippākkaiyu naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭa
kkamum porutaṭa rīḻattaraicar tam muṭiyu māṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyu muṉṉavarpakkal te
ṉṉavar vaitta cun=taramuṭiyu min=tira ṉāramu n=teṇṭirai yīḻamaṇṭala muḻuvatu meṟipaṭaik keraḷar muṟai
maiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatir velait to
lperuṅkāvaṟ palpaḻan=tīvu māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakesarivaṉmarāṉa śrīrā
jentracoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 6vatu malāṭāṉa janaṉātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu
brahmadeyan tirukkovalūr sabhaiyom nilavilai yāvaṇam Innāṭṭup pāṉūrk
kūṟṟattu brahmadeyaṅ kaṭaṟiyūṟṟāṉa kalimallacaturvvedimaṅkalam yāḷuṅkaṇat
tāruḷ kuravacari mādhavassarvvātitthaṉukku nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷur
paḻaveri kaḻakuṟuñcūlikkāṟaye viṟpataṟku kīḻpāṟkellai kūṉikkaṅkaikku meṟku
n teṉpāṟkellai tevatāṉaṅ kallaikkavar nilattukku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai
coppukkāṉukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai ceppukkāṉukke teṟkumāka Innāṟperellai
yi lakappaṭṭa nilam Araimāvum Itaṉ kīḻaik kūṉikkaṅkaiyi litanoṭu meṟkaṭaya Orumāvu
ṟṟu koḷavuṭaiya vilaidravyamum Iṟaidravyamu maṟakko
The rest of the inscription is built in.
Digital edition of SII 7.872 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
